name: Telegram Userbot
description: Just coz we're too lazy, we program it, to make stuff easier. A userbot to improve telegram experience (`･ω･´)

OPEN_WEATHER_MAP_APPID.description: Get your own APPID (API key) from https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather

SCREENSHOT_LAYER_ACCESS_KEY.description: Get your own ACCESS_KEY (API key) from http://api.screenshotlayer.com/api/capture

BOTLOG.description: Incase you want to turn off logging, put this to false

CONSOLE_LOGGER_VERBOSE.description: If you need Verbosity on the Logging

YOUTUBE_API_KEY.description: YouTube Data API Key for .yt command. Get from https://console.cloud.google.com

DEFAULT_BIO.description: Set a default bio to be shown when you are not listening on Spotify..

SPOTIFY_USERNAME.description: Put your Spotify Username (your Spotify email id).

SPOTIFY_BIO_PREFIX.description: Put the prefix that you want to show while you listen to music

WELCOME_MUTE.description: Mute some known spammer bots after they join.
